tool_description: Creates customized portrait photography service packages with pricing, deliverables, and add-on options based on client needs and session type.

session_type.description: Type of portrait session: individual, couple, family, corporate, maternity, engagement

session_duration_hours.description: Planned session duration in hours (0.5 to 8.0)

location_type.description: Shoot location: studio, outdoor, client_home, venue

edited_photo_count.description: Number of professionally edited photos to deliver (5 to 200)

additional_outfits.description: Number of additional outfit changes (0 to 5)

error_messages: Invalid session type: Use one of [individual, couple, family, corporate, maternity, engagement].
Invalid duration: Session duration must be between 0.5 and 8.0 hours.
Invalid location: Use one of [studio, outdoor, client_home, venue].
Invalid photo count: Edited photos must be between 5 and 200.
Invalid outfit count: Additional outfits must be between 0 and 5.
Package incompatibility: Some combinations may not be available for selected session type.
usage: Specify session_type, session_duration_hours, location_type, and edited_photo_count as base requirements. Add optional services like print_package, rush_delivery, additional_outfits, makeup_artist, or second_photographer to customize the package.

package_id.description: Unique identifier for the created service package

base_price.description: Base price for core photography services

addon_price.description: Total price for additional services and options

total_price.description: Final total price including all services and add-ons

deliverables.description: List of what will be delivered to the client

estimated_turnaround_days.description: Expected delivery timeline in business days
